name: The brand new Spawn Invaders
description:
DESCRIPTION
You are the last hope to save your planet from the alien invasion!

CONTROLS
- "a & d" for movement.
- "Space" for shooting.
- "p" for pause.

CREDITS
This is a project made by students for the joy and knowledge about making better games.
- Programmer: Enrique Puyol Martín.
- Artist: Mario Martínez Palacio.
- CEO: Diego C. Torguet. (@DiegoCTorguet)
- Producer & Designer: Antonio Bastos Córdoba. (@antonio10bc)
- Logo: Marta Aguiló.

We used:
"Broken Reality", "Deep Haze", "Phantom from Space"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
